spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent overall room placement and wall alignment. Dimensional scaling is highly accurate. Points deducted for slight narrowing of the hallway entrance and simplified door frames lacking original swing orientation detail.

structural_fidelity.notes: Perfect execution of roof-removed cutaway on a dark background. All rooms present. Points deducted for the omission of the exterior doorway swing near the entrance closet area.

furniture_mapping.notes: Highly faithful mapping of block-style furniture. Kitchen island and bathroom fixtures match specifically. Minor deduction for simplified dining chair count.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Compliance with low-poly, flat-shaded style is high. Orthographic isometric view is nearly perfect. Deduction for slightly more pronounced shadows than 'flat shading' constraints typically allow.

detected_errors.description: Missing swing indicators for several interior doors, making structural flow less clear than the 2D plan.
Ambient shadows are slightly too dramatic for a strictly flat-shaded requirement.
